p.span: This meeting will be open to the public electronically only*. There will be no physical meeting location to attend in-person. Any changes to the meeting schedule will be posted to this website.

span.class: x-el x-el-span c1-84 c1-85 c1-b c1-c c1-d c1-e c1-f c1-g x-d-ux

p.span: On March 12, 2020, Governor Carney issued a declaration of a state of emergency for the state of Delaware due to a public health threat. The State of Emergency allows all public meetings of executive branch public bodies, including the Academy of Dover Board of Directors Meeting, to be conducted electronically, either by means of telephone conference call or video-conference call. The Academy of Dover Board of Education Meeting scheduled for April 23, 2020 will be open to the public electronically only. There will be no physical meeting location for the public to attend in-person. Directions on how the public may attend this meeting electronically have been posted on the agenda and aodcharter.org.

Both phone and an online component for students and teachers to interact while we continue offering high-quality instructional opportunities are in place. We are committed to continuing the education of our students. The button below will take you to the page that has direct contact information for each of our educators.

p.span: Our educators love what we do and know that we are making a difference in the lives of children! We are a small Academy focusing on meeting the needs of the whole child. We have a strong passion for our work and have space available. If you are looking for a place where your child will get that special extra touch, you have found it! We are a K-5 school offering small class sizes, a caring climate, and have educators looking to build excitement for learning in each and every one of our students.

p.span: The Academy of Dover Charter School utilizes an open enrollment plan. Any child who is qualified under the laws of Delaware for enrollment to a public school is qualified for admission to the Academy of Dover Charter School.

span.class: x-el x-el-span c1-84 c1-85 c1-b c1-c c1-d c1-e c1-f c1-g x-d-ux

p.span: If more students submit applications than can be accommodated by the Academy's capacity — class, grade or building, a waiting list will be maintained for each grade level in order of receipt of their application, on a first-come, first-served basis. Sibling preference will be honored as long as there is room in the particular grade. If the grade is full, the sibling will be put on a waiting list for the grade.

span.class: x-el x-el-span c1-84 c1-85 c1-b c1-c c1-d c1-e c1-f c1-g x-d-ux

p.span: All applicants are required to attend a tour with the Head of School before application is accepted.

span.class: x-el x-el-span c1-84 c1-85 c1-b c1-c c1-d c1-e c1-f c1-g x-d-ux

p.span: If you would like more information, please contact the school at 302-674-0684, pick up an application in the Academy's Main Office, or you can also complete an Online Enrollment Application:
